definition: Wannian county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
perpetual calendar/ten thousand year calendar/Islamic calendar introduced to Yuan China by Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁
to have one's name go down in history as a byword for infamy (idiom)
Wannian county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

sentences.english: Billions years ago, human had moved from ocean to land and dominated the earth;
sentences.chinese: 亿万年后人从陆地走向森林，选择水岸。

sentences.english: Many million years ago the territory of the present Perm region was occupied by the Perm Sea.
sentences.chinese: 现在的彼尔姆地区在数百万年前还属于彼尔姆海。

sentences.english: Polar bears evolved rapidly from brown bears within the last million years.
sentences.chinese: 北极熊在过去的100万年来，迅速从棕熊进化而来。

sentences.english: Looking at the cave with stalactites and statues, how also get a few million years?
sentences.chinese: 看着洞里的钟乳石和石佛像，怎么也得个几万年吧？

sentences.english: Yet even industry doormats Yahoo (YHOO, Fortune 500) and AOL are profitable.
sentences.chinese: 即便万年老二雅虎和AOL都在盈利。

sentences.english: I think, evergreen, as air, will definitely be a strong vitality.
sentences.chinese: 我想，万年青那样神气，生命力一定会很强。

sentences.english: Dad sadly evergreen victory, for it to re-earth.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸伤心地捧起万年青，重新为它培土。

sentences.english: These stars form from protostars in just 10,000 to 100,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这些恒星只花1万到10万年就结束了原恒星阶段。

sentences.english: Scientists have found life in an ecosystem trapped underneath a glacier in Antarctica for nearly 2 million years.
sentences.chinese: 万年之久的一个生态系统中，科学家们发现了生命。

sentences.english: It is a symbiotic relationship that has worked well for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 这个互利共生的关系已经持续了千百万年。

sentences.english: If heaven is a million years away, oh just call me and I make your day.
sentences.chinese: 纵使路途遥远千年万年，我也必定将你带入那片天堂。

sentences.english: The black rocks are all lava from a volcano which erupted here 10.000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这些黑色的岩石都是一万年前火山爆发流出的岩浆。

sentences.english: His studies of volcanoes on the Fijian island of Kadavu indicated they had not been active for tens of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 他研究斐济卡达屋岛上据称几万年未活动的火山。

sentences.english: Neanderthals were primitive beings that lived alongside modern man 30, 000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 穴居人是30万年前和现代人同时存在的原始人类。

sentences.english: Yeah, there'll be somebody around 100,000 years from now, 500,000 years from now, and maybe they'll be me.
sentences.chinese: 没错十万年后会有一个人，5万年后，也许他们是我。

definition: throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
before the end of the year/before the new year
this past year/over the last years
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
